member.name: T:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker
member.summary: Utility class to check a script's validity.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.LogInternalMessage
member.summary: Action to log an internal message (defaults to .

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.BadExecuteCommands
member.summary: A set of Bukkit commands that if they appear in an 'execute' script command should receive a warning automatically.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CommandsWithColonsAndArguments
member.summary: A non-complete set of Denizen commands that can end with a colon and contain arguments, for checking certain syntax errors.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CommandsWithColonsButNoArguments
member.summary: A non-complete set of Denizen commands that can end with a colon and do not have to contain any arguments, for checking certain syntax errors.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.FullOriginalScript
member.summary: The full original script text.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.Lines
member.summary: All lines of the script.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CleanedLines
member.summary: All lines, pre-trimmed and lowercased.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CommentLines
member.summary: The number of lines that were comments.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.BlankLines
member.summary: The number of lines that were blank.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.StructureLines
member.summary: The number of lines that were structural (ending with a colon).

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CodeLines
member.summary: The number of lines that were code (starting with a dash).

member.name: T:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.ScriptWarning
member.summary: Represents a warning about a script.

member.summary: A unique key for this *type* of warning.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.ScriptWarning.CustomMessageForm
member.summary: The locally customized message form.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.ScriptWarning.Line
member.summary: The line this applies to.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.ScriptWarning.StartChar
member.summary: The starting character position.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.ScriptWarning.EndChar
member.summary: The ending character position.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.Errors
member.summary: A list of all errors about this script.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.Warnings
member.summary: A list of all warnings about this script.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.MinorWarnings
member.summary: A list of all minor warnings about this script.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.Infos
member.summary: A list of informational notices about this script.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.Debugs
member.summary: A list of debug notices about this script, generally don't actually show to users.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.Injects
member.summary: A track of all script names that appear to be injected, for false-warning reduction.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Construct the ScriptChecker instance from a script string.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.Warn(System.Collections.Generic.List{SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.ScriptWarning},System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a warning to track.
member.param: The zero-indexed line the warning is regarding.
The unique warning key, for compressing repeat warns.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.ClearCommentsFromLines
member.summary: Clears all comment lines.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CleanScriptForYAMLProcessing
member.summary: Performs some minimal script cleaning, based on logic in DenizenCore, that matches a script load in as valid YAML, for use with .

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CheckYAML
member.summary: Checks if the script is even valid YAML (if not, critical error).

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.LoadInjects
member.summary: Looks for injects, to prevent issues with later checks.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.BasicLineFormatCheck
member.summary: Checks the basic format of every line of the script, to locate stray text or useless lines.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CheckForTabs
member.summary: Checks if "\t" tabs are used (instead of spaces). If so, warning.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CheckForBraces
member.summary: Checks if { braces } are used (instead of modern "colon:" syntax). If so, error.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CheckForAncientDefs
member.summary: Checks if %ancientdef%s are used (instead of modern "<[defname]>" syntax). If so, error.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CheckForOldDefs
member.summary: Checks if <def[oldDefs]> are used (instead of modern "<[defname]>" syntax). If so, warning.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CheckSingleTag(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Performs the necessary checks on a single tag.
member.param: The index of the character where this tag starts.

member.name: M:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CheckSingleArgument(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Performs the necessary checks on a single argument.
member.param: The index of the character where this argument starts.
Whether this is an argument to a command.

member.summary: The character index that this argument starts at.

member.name: F:SharpDenizenTools.ScriptAnalysis.ScriptChecker.CommandArgument.Text

member.summary: Build args, as copied from Denizen Core -> ArgumentHelper.

member.summary: Performs the necessary checks on a single command line.
member.param: The index of the character where this argument starts.
The text of the command line.
